body:
Dear Developers,

I encountered an issue about .spack directory created by spack:
Currently spack shares the same directory $HOME/.speck/linux it created whether working on IBM Power or x86_64 machines in the same NFS, which could be an issue when switching to a machine of a different platform to work on. Is it possible to allow user to specify it as a different directory through environment variable?

Best 
Shelton
title: Issue of .spack under NFS for multiple platforms
